title: Pilate's Ghost
description: When a shadowy enemy rises from the dead, and the heavy hand of a guilty past weighs on his marriage, John Pilate must master his own fear and marshal his resources to defend his family and his life. Soon he discovers he isn't the only one fighting a desperate battle, and that not all ghosts from his past are hostile... Book 3 of the acclaimed John Pilate Mysteries. Get Book 1: "Pilate's Cross" and Book 2: "Pilate's Key" on Lulu and wherever books and ebooks are sold.
author: J. Alexander Greenwood
